Description: HTML stands for HyperText Markup Language. It is used on the frontend and gives structure to webpages, which you can style with CSS and make interactive with JavaScript.

A reference guide that provides an overview of all HTML elements.

Learn HTML and CSS with interactive tutorials and examples.
A hands-on HTML learning platform with interactive exercises.
An interactive HTML course on GitHub.

A step-by-step tutorial on building a website with HTML on YouTube.
A crash course in HTML for beginners on YouTube.
